snippet: In the wake of the Boston Marathon attack, bomb-sniffing dogs will be out at the Brooklyn Half Marathon this weekend, and runners will have to use clear, race-issued bags for their belongings.
abstract: New York Road Runners, working with New York City Police Dept, ramp up security for Brooklyn Half Marathon in the wake of the Boston Marathon bombings.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of the Boston Marathon attack, bomb-sniffing dogs will be out at the Brooklyn Half Marathon this weekend, and runners will have to use clear, race-issued bags for their belongings.

headline.seo: Larger Brooklyn Half Marathon Entails Greater Security Measures
headline.main: Brooklyn Race Grows; So Does Security
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Race Grows; So Does Security
